name: codeql-development-mcp-server_repo
description: An MCP server supporting LLM requests for CodeQL development tools and resources.
author: @github/ps-codeql

scripts.build: npm run build -w server && npm run build -w extensions/vscode
scripts.build-and-test: npm run build:all && npm run test:all
scripts.build:all: npm run tidy && npm run build -w server && npm run build -w client && npm run build -w extensions/vscode
scripts.clean: npm run clean -w client -w server -w extensions/vscode && npm run clean:test-dbs
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w client -w server -w extensions/vscode
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix -w client -w server -w extensions/vscode
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client && npm run test:vscode
scripts.test:all: npm run test:server && npm run test:client && npm run test:vscode
scripts.package:vsix: npm run clean:test-dbs && npm run build -w server && npm run package -w extensions/vscode
scripts.tidy: npm run lint:fix && npm run format
scripts.tidy:check: npm run lint && npm run format:check
